{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AboCom |model=WAP2101 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/02/2007 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point,bridge |fcc_id=MQ4WAP2101 |ic_id= |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2317 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3205AMC-20G |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM639165TS-7G |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2317 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Attansic |eth_chip2_model=F2 |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=portable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Wireless 802.11b/g Portable Router''
"M01-W2101-D10" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"RFPCA584406IFAXB05" and "Walsin-951219" is silkscreened on an antenna.
This FCC ID also defines the WAP2101U (wall-mounted unit).
The default IP is from the FCC manual. :The manual's entry in the SSID field is '''Wireless_AP'''. The default SSID is stated to be '''Untitled''' later in the manual.
